page.title: 05DAILY LIFE
page.content:
Amanda Matthews rises at 8 a.m.,and has a breakfast of toast and bacon. She feeds her pet rabbit before leaving for school at 8.30 a.m. She arrives at school 5 minutes later. For lunch she has chips,sausage,a biscuit and something to drink. During the break she plays ball with her friends. She also sees her mother. After school she walks to a friend's house and stays there for about 2 hours and watches television. She leaves Sarah's house at about 5p.m. and walks home. She has her tea of lentel soup and unleavened bread. Then she walks back to Sarah's house where she usually watches a video. Finally, she goes back home where she has hot chocolate and goes to bed.
By Meg Booth and Saffron Bulloch.
